data.title: Go Hungry
data.text: I had read a review before regarding this place stating they give you a mountain of food. Well I can attest to that statement. They certainly like to challenge how much food they can cram into that styrofoam container. The pork chops are as big as your face. The churrasco was lean and flavorful. And such a large quantity given. About $24 generously fed three people with quality choices. The options are plentiful! Seafood paella, salmon, shrimp, fried cod, fried pork belly, pork chops, ribs, roasted chicken, fried chicken wings, steak, any type of Cuban sandwich, and fresh juices! Don't worry if you don't speak Spanish, everyone there was very friendly and eager to have you try stuff. Would go back anytime I'm in the Miami area.

data.title: Amazing place
data.text: Amazing place love it . The food is good and the attention was fast and nice . I would like to go back anytime

data.title: Discussing place not clean and not very good to eat there.
data.text: My husband and when there  today purchase a complete dinner rice, plantain, and pork the lady next to us another customer was ordering her food. The lady that was helping her by mistake confused my dinner with the ladys. So we came home and notice it was the wrong food so we when back. When when back and told the lady that had help us that she gave me the wrong food she put that food aside just in case the lady would come back. So she did come back while we where there. They gave her the food we had returned. Thought that was discussing! When it came the time to give me mine I told her  to give me new food not the one the lady had brought back. So they did, but they where putting the food the lady had returned that was suppose to be mine back where the food they sell to other people to sell it. I think if an inspector where  to see that they would close. I would not go there anymore.

data.title: Good way to sample Cuban food
data.text: This is a good way to see a huge variety of dishes and try several different things, as it's a huge cafeteria style place. The servers did not seem to understand any English though, and weren't very patient. I ended up getting several things that were a mystery, but they were good. Would recommend to anyone willing to go with the flow and have an experience.

data.title: highly recommended, if you like cuban food and sandwiches
data.text: i tried two kind of fruit juices, and a pair of sandwiches, i loved all... the Pan con Bistec was awesome...

data.title: Great value but terrible assistance !
data.text: This how I classify this place! It can't be consider a fast food neither  a restaurant. It is just a place to buy some big portions of Cuban food and take it home! The place is pretty hot, no AC at all. What really called my attention that day was the tremendous lack of interest to assist the clients. They were like OMG why the hell you come at this time to bother me ?""""

data.title: Loved it
data.text: The best mango juice ever...I totally recommend this place. The food is great...as cuban as it can be. Loved it.

data.title: Awesome food and people watching
data.text: This is my favorite placios de los jugos because the food is awesome and the place is very clean. Our meal can feed up to 3 people.  The variety of food is great.  But one of my favorite things to do is to people watchinng while enjoying the meal in an air conditioned center area.  Mostly all the other PDLJ are opened air not A/C.

data.title: Great Restaurant
data.text: This place is awesome,the food is tasty and prices are good,my only problem is most of the servers can't understand english and they get upset when you can't explain yourself,and they make you feel like you are suppose to speak spanish.This is America ! We speak English.I think the owners should send them to learn english and treat us english speaking customers just like their spanish speaking ones.I was there 3 times in the 2 days i was in Miami and will definitely be back,but with my spanish speaking cuban friends.

data.title: Wanted a fruit smoothie
data.text: This was my second visit to this establishment and I would recommend it. I like the fruit smoothie because it's pure fruit without milk/yogurt. There is a good variety of food to choose from. Food is fresh and it has a Cuban taste to it. Try it.

data.title: awsome food taste
data.text: I like the taste of the food, tipical "tamales", guavas pastries, juices mamey, it doesnt have enough seats , but still I recommend it.If you are in Hyleaih for tryed some good memories from cuban fast foods..

data.title: Me encantó el lugar
data.text: La comida excelente un servició rápido con un ambiente latino acogedor la atención de la empleada lisandra fue estupenda y muy atenta. A la familia cuco le encanto el lugar.lo recomiendo

data.title: Abundante
data.text: Cuando entre pensé que iba a tomar un jugo y un sándwich, cual es mi sorpresa que lo que menos veía era jugos . El lugar es muy concurrido, hay gran variedad de comidas, tantas que no sabia que escoger. Sirven tanto hasta con la media porción , que fácilmente con una porción comen 2 personas y hasta tres. Todo lo que probamos nos gusto. Es un lugar muy visitado.

data.title: Variado
data.text: Comida criolla gran variedad,come caliente y con A/C. Económico, bien organizado y buen café.Felicidades de estacionamiento y limpieza óptima

data.title: Excelente option para comer en Miami
data.text: El palacio de Los jugos Hialeah es una excelente opcion para Los que quieren comida cubana. Los jugos naturales son lo maximo y la comida abundante y a muy buen precio. Lo recomiendo.

data.title: Delicioso!
data.text: Comimos muy rico y bebimos jugó fresco de coco, maracuya, y remolacha! He quedado varias veces en Hialeah y me gustaría haber conocido este lugar más antes! Loved it!!

data.title: Excelente!!!!
data.text: Cada vez que voy a Miami me encanta ir a este lugar. La comida me recuerda mi infancia en Cuba. Todo lo que sirven tiene excelente calidad y los precios son adecuados.
